bio: Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Fond of lemon drops and Fawkes the phoenix.
Gryffindor student, top of her class. Loves reading and is a loyal friend. Member of Dumbledore's Army.
Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts. Has a soft spot for magical creatures, big and small.
Head of Gryffindor House and Transfiguration professor. Strict but fair, with a love for all things Gryffindor.
Head of Slytherin House and Potions Master. Has a mysterious demeanor and a complicated past.
